itchy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if part of your body is itchy, it feels slightly unpleasant and you want to rub it with your nails
itchy.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: My eyes sometimes get red and itchy in the summer.
itchy.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if clothes are itchy, they make your skin feel slightly unpleasant, so that you want to rub your skin with your nails
itchy.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: wanting to go somewhere new or do something different
itchy.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: He’s had that job now for about eight years, and he’s starting to get itchy.
I’ve only been back home for a few months and I’ve already got itchy feet  (=the desire to go somewhere new).
